Text:
First, your record doesn't have anything in it. I think you want:

    type 
        rekord = record
            value: Integer;
            row: Integer;
        end;

And when you read it in:

    for i := 1 to 5 do
    begin
        Read(mas[i].value);
        max[i].row = i;
    end

The above will number the rows 1, 2, 3, ...

And in your sort:

    if max[j].value > max[d].value

First, your record doesn't have anything in it. I think you want:

    type 
        rekord = record
            value: Integer;
            row: Integer;
        end;

And when you read it in:

    for i := 1 to 5 do
    begin
        Read(mas[i].value);
        max[i].row = i;
    end

The above will number the rows 1, 2, 3, ...

And in your sort:

    if max[j].value > max[d].value

When you swap, be sure to swap the whole record as you're currently doing. Don't just swap the values.
